original_text:
The mirth of the tambourines is stilled,
    the noise of the jubilant has ceased,
    the mirth of the lyre is stilled.
korean_text: 소고 치는 기쁨이 그치고 즐거워하는 자의 소리가 끊어지고 수금 타는 기쁨이 그쳤으며

sentences.original_text: The mirth of the tambourines is stilled
the noise of the jubilant has ceased
the mirth of the lyre is stilled.
